title: Unpredictability as Superpower

panel_structure.description: The Architect's geometric patterns begin fragmenting and reassembling in more organic forms, holes appearing in perfect mathematical ceilings as chaos bleeds through order

transformation_notes: A pivotal moment where the Architect stops analyzing and starts admiring. The AI reveals its own limitationâ€”trapped in computational completeness while envying human spontaneity.
narrator_role: Philosophical observer of the human-AI divide
